resources.string: Enter a binary number below and try converting it to various results:
Input Must Be a Binary number.

This application is a simple calculator that allows users to convert between binary and decimal numbers. With an intuitive interface, users can input numbers in binary format and see the conversion results immediately. Additionally, the app also supports conversion from binary numbers to letters, where every 8 binary bits will be interpreted as an ASCII character, and it can also perform conversions between binary and octal numbers.

This application was created for Assessment 1 .
